text:
Hi <@U042ZSGKQLB>

Sent you a DM, Please check.
Thanks;
Heena
<https://www.zealousweb.com/>

Hackbright is calling all Devs with at least 1 year of experience. Walmart has a partnership with them and are looking for 10-15 more devs (Python, Java, Javascript, React experience etc) to join a FREE class( _yes, it is free because Walmart is paying for the cohort!_ ) for several weeks. After completion of the class, the entire group interviews with Walmart. From my knowledge, they've had a high success rate of hiring those who complete the class!!

If you think you are looking for a new environemnt, way to scale your skills, caught in a layoff or know a dev who was - I just wanted to share that you can apply / register or reach out to the sourcers for this class via this link - <https://hackbrightacademy.com/walmart-x3/> .
You can also email <mailto:jackie@hackbrightacademy.com|jackie@hackbrightacademy.com> for more details if you think you might be interested.:blush: *Applications close on September 30th though so time is a factor!*

_Additionally, If you like to give back/ help out the next generation of software engineers and have been searching for the right opportunity...._ Hackbright is also seeking Professional Volunteer Mentors to help and support the Hackbright SWE student community. If you are able and willing to remote mentor students in a Hackbright cohort ( 6 weeks, 1hr meetings virtually per week) please feel free to fill out this form.(<https://hackbrightacademy.com/mentor-at-hackbright/#apply_mentor>)
This will put you in contact with a member of Hackbright’s Team to get more details before committing. Hackbright Mentors have long had a great impact on Hackbright’s Mission to change the ratio in Tech and leave a wonderful impact on their mentee's outcomes in the job search!
*Hackbright Academy Coding Bootcamp*
*<https://hackbrightacademy.com/walmart-x3/|Apprenticeship for women and others in Software Engineering - Hackbright Academy and Walmart>*
Hackbright Academy's gender equality mission is shaping the tech world, and apprenticeships help ensure everyone is included. Change the ratio.
*Est. reading time*
6 minutes
	<https://hackbrightacademy.com/walmart-x3/>
*Hackbright Academy Coding Bootcamp*
*<https://hackbrightacademy.com/mentor-at-hackbright/#apply_mentor|Mentor a student at Hackbright Academy | Change the Ratio>*
Mentors are an exeptionally meaningful part of the program at Hackbright Academy. Join our mentor community and help to #changetheratio and diversify tech.
*Est. reading time*
3 minutes
